definition: sour/tart/sick at heart/grieved/sore/aching/pedantic/impractical/to make sarcastic remarks about sb/an acid

sentences.english: The rough extract of Pinggu mushroom PPO was obtained by ammonium sulfate precipitation method.
sentences.chinese: 採用硫酸銨沉澱法得到平菇多酚氧化酶粗提液。

sentences.english: Ammonium sulfate is against potassium sulfite pulping of rice straw.
sentences.chinese: 硫酸銨對稻草亞硫酸鉀蒸煮有不利影響。

sentences.english: Ammonium sulfate deposition were used to get kidney bean phytohemagglutinin.
sentences.chinese: 用硫酸銨沉澱法得到芸豆植物凝集素。

sentences.english: Add ammonium persulfate and TEMED and mix by gently swirling or inverting the container.
sentences.chinese: 加入過硫酸銨和TEMED，並輕輕攪拌使其混勻。
